text: Peter Keleghan is a Canadian actor and writer, perhaps best known for portraying Ben Bellow in the comedy series 18 to Life, Clark Claxton Sr. in the comedy series Billable Hours and Ranger Gord in The Red Green Show. ==Early life== Keleghan was born in Montreal, Quebec. He earned his BA in English Drama from York University in Toronto, Ontario. ==Early life== Keleghan is married to actress Leah Pinsent. ==References== ==Other websites== * Peter Keleghan on The Canadian Encyclopedia * Category:Living people Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Actors from Montreal Category:York University alumni Category:1959 births
title: Peter Keleghan
